verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Lord forgive us
For the things we’ve placed above you
Lord we’re sorry
For the plans we’ve placed before you

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who could wear this but you?
Who could bear the weight
Of your glory and truth ... so we

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Crown you with many crowns
We the created, crown you creator now
We bow to the only God
of all creation, no other worthy of a crown

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God, please help us
For our enemy is raging
God, we’re weak but
Our spirits are willing
